seprini.controllers

Class AircraftController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.InputListener
      • seprini.controllers.AircraftController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.EventListener, Controller

    public final class AircraftController
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.InputListener
implements Controller
    This is the controller for aircraft.
    Author:
    Samuel

                  GameScreen screen,
                  MenuController mc)
        Constructor for aircraft controller, creates appropriate controller, e.g. for the difficulty.
        Parameters:
        diff - game difficulty, changes number of aircraft and time between them
        airspace - the group where all of the waypoints and aircraft will be added

        screen -
